attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners already struggling to find money for the ever increasing energy and council tax costs need free dental care. Even NHS dental treatment is expensive on a paltry state pension and many pensioners go without dental care as they have to prioritise in favour of their basic needs. In this day and age retired people should not have to rely on these petitions to enable them have a decent standard of living, its disgraceful.
